amendment.description: To increase by $360,800,000 the amount of supplemental appropriations for Other Procurement, Army, for the procurement of armored Tactical Wheeled Vehicles for units deployed in Iraq and Afghanistan or for other Army priorities, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2464 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2464 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12510) To increase by $360,800,000 the amount of supplemental appropriations for Other Procurement, Army, for the procurement of armored Tactical Wheeled Vehicles for units deployed in Iraq and Afghanistan or for other Army priorities, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2464 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2464 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh.
